metadata.title: SOGC Construction & Consultants | sogc | Leading Construction Company Egypt
metadata.description: SOGC (sogc) Construction & Consultants - Leading construction company in Egypt specializing in general contracting, full finishing, and infrastructure. SOGC Construction based in Suez & 10th of Ramadan. Contact us today.

hero.title: SOGC Construction - Building Egypt's Future
hero.subtitle: sogc - Professional Construction & Consulting Services in Egypt

services.title: Our
services.subtitle: With over thirty years of experience in residential renovation design and over 16,000 renovation plans delivered to this day. Homeowners can have confidence in their choice of a metal roofing Contractor knowing they have met certain requirements.

1.title: GENERAL
1.subtitle: CONTRACTING
1.description: Comprehensive management and execution of all types of projects, from design to delivery, following the highest standards of quality and safety.

2.title: FULL
2.subtitle: FINISHING
2.description: Complete finishing works for apartments, villas, and commercial units, including painting, flooring, gypsum, electrical, and plumbing works

3.title: EXCAVATION
3.subtitle: EARTHWORKS
3.description: Professional excavation, backfilling, and land leveling services using advanced equipment to ensure precision and efficiency on site.

4.title: HEAVY
4.subtitle: EQUIPMENT
4.description: Operation, rental, and supply of heavy machinery and construction equipment to support excavation, earthworks, and large scale infrastructure projects

5.title: TRANSPORTATION
5.subtitle: SERVICES
5.description: Providing comprehensive transportation and logistics solutions for materials, equipment, and project supplies to ensure smooth site operations.

6.title: FUTURE
6.subtitle: SERVICES
6.description: Expanding into real estate marketing and investment projects, including malls, compounds, and residential developments, offering integrated property solutions.

about.title: About Us
about.subtitle: SOGC is a general contracting company established in 2018, headquartered in Suez with a branch in 10th of Ramadan City.
about.subtitle2: We specialize in executing and managing integrated projects across multiple sectors, including:

service1.title: Construction and Building Works
service1.description: We execute high-quality residential, commercial, and industrial projects with precision, adhering to the highest engineering and safety standards to ensure long-lasting structures.

service2.title: Infrastructure Works (Roads – Wastewater Treatment Plants)
service2.description: Our infrastructure division delivers essential public works, including durable road networks and advanced wastewater treatment facilities that support sustainable urban development.

service3.title: Interior and Exterior Finishing
service3.description: We provide elegant and durable finishing solutions, ensuring every detail—inside and out—reflects superior craftsmanship and aesthetic excellence.

service4.title: Excavation and Site Preparation
service4.description: Our team handles all types of earthworks and grading, preparing construction sites with accuracy and efficiency for optimal project execution.

service5.title: Quarry Operations and Supply of Building Materials (Gravel, Soil, Sand, Stones, etc.)
service5.description: We manage quarry operations and supply top-grade construction materials that meet national standards and support large-scale building and infrastructure projects.

service6.title: Transportation and Supporting Contracting Services
service6.description: SOGC offers reliable logistics, heavy equipment transport, and on-site support services to keep projects running smoothly and on schedule.

footer.description: Within a few years, the company has achieved remarkable success , providing comprehensive construction solutions for major governmental and private sector clients.

timeline1.description: Founded SOGC Construction, laying the foundation for a vision to become one of Egypt’s leading companies in general contracting and real estate development.

timeline2.description: Expanded operations into finishing and fit-out works, completing multiple residential and administrative projects.

timeline3.description: Secured major governmental partnerships and began largescale infrastructure and excavation projects.

timeline4.description: Delivered the first mega-project exceeding 50 million EGP, marking a significant milestone in company growth.

timeline5.description: Expanded the heavy-equipment fleet and executed the New Delta and national-infrastructure projects.

timeline6.description: Ventured into real-estate marketing and strategic development to strengthen market presence.

projects.title: Latest Projects
projects.subtitle: Check out our latest construction projects around the world

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Find answers to common questions about our construction services.

items.question: What services does SOGC Construction offer?
items.answer: We provide a full range of construction and consultation services, including project design, execution, and management with top-quality standards.

items.question: How can I contact your team?
items.answer: You can reach us through the Contact page on our website or email us directly at info@sogc-construction.com.

items.question: Do you work on international projects?
items.answer: Yes, our team is experienced in handling projects both locally and internationally.

items.question: What makes SOGC different from other construction companies?
items.answer: We combine innovation, sustainability, and client-focused solutions to deliver exceptional results every time.

about.title: About SOGC
about.description: SOGC Construction & Consultants is a leading Egyptian construction company established in 2018, specializing in general contracting, infrastructure, and engineering consultancy.
